short_summary: Temporary Help Services Requirement for Department of National Defense (DND)
description: This requirement is for: Department of National Defense (DND)", this is open to only EN578-172870 supply arrangement holders who have qualified under the following streams and categories: Stream 13 - Policy and Advisory Services - Special Advisor.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Notice Details
* **Reference Number:** cb-4847-99397140
* **Solicitation Number:** S4384520
* **Publication Date:** 2023-04-18
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-20T16:00:00
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defense
* **Postion Title:** One (1) Special Advisor
* **Security Requirement:** Secret

#### Service Requirement
The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services. Suppliers selected from a CPSS picked list, under Stream 13 - Policy and Advisory Services - Special Advisor, are invited to submit proposals.

#### Eligible Suppliers
Fifteen (15) eligible suppliers have been invited to submit proposals. These are:

* Akkada professional Services and Zernam Enterprise in JV
* Calian Ltd.
* COMPUTACENTER TERAMACH INC.
* Dare Human Resources Corporation
* FMC Professionals Inc.
* Gartner Canada Co.
* HubSpoke Inc.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* Lumina IT inc.
* Makwa Resourcing Inc. and Koroc Consulting Inc. in JOINT VENTURE
* Mekkra Corp.
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
* Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
* Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
* SYSTEMATIX SOLUTIONS TI INC/SYSTEMATIX IT SOLUTIONS INC

#### Tender Details

* **Procedure:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Contract Award:** Lowest Price
* **Language of Tender:** English and French
* **Annexes:** To be downloaded from CanadaBuys website: [English and French attachments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4847/rfp-s4384520-english-%281.pdf) and [English and French attachments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4847/s4384520-rfp-french-%281.pdf)

#### Contact Information
* Cfsg(O-G) Temp Help
* Phone: 613 971 – 795
* Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSG
